Address.value: 100 BELLEVUE PARKWAY,MUTUAL FUND DEPARTMENT, WILMINGTON, Delaware, 19809, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Fund seeks a high level of current income with capital preservation. It invests at least 80% of its assets in securities guaranteed by the US government or rated either AAA by SP or Aaa by Moodys. The Fund also invests at least 65% of its assets in mortgagebacked securities.
